text: The Fan is a 1981 American slasher fan directed by Edward Bianchi and based on the novel of the same name by Bob Randall. It stars Lauren Bacall, James Garner, Maureen Stapleton, Michael Biehn, Hector Elizondo, Griffin Dunne, Dana Delany and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1981 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies based on books
title: The Fan (1981 movie)
